description:
Kohana and the rest of the committee begin practicing for the collaborative "Art Session."
Their advisor Chieri instructs them on the secret of the Art Session: to make their hearts one. With no clear understanding of what they`re meant to do, they search for a solution using a variety of methods. Tsukushi Monet watches them with amazement and disgust.
Because he plans to study abroad in England, Monet comes to announce he can`t participate in the executive committee, but--
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: いたずらな風に吹かれて
